attributes.title: Content Strategist
attributes.description:
## Who We Are

Remote Employees is an international outsourcing company that works with businesses across Europe, the USA, and other regions.

We help companies find talented remote specialists, and we help candidates build stable, long-term careers.

We are now looking for a Content Strategist who can develop strong content, create visuals and ads, and support brand growth for international projects.

## What You Will Do

You will be responsible for the full content cycle — from idea to publication:

### Core Responsibilities:

* **Develop content strategies and content plans.**
* **Prepare and publish posts on social media platforms.**
* **Create engaging texts:** captions, ad copy, storytelling elements, and more.
* **Develop and launch advertising campaigns on Facebook and Instagram.**
* **Produce visual assets using Canva, CapCut, and similar tools.**
* **Maintain consistent brand tone and visual style.**
* **Analyze content performance and suggest improvements.**

## Requirements

* English proficiency B1+ or higher.
* Ability to work with both text and visual content.
* Understanding of social media principles and digital content.
* Creativity, organization, and attention to detail.
* Willingness to grow in content strategy and digital marketing.

## Will Be an Advantage

* Experience with Meta Ads Manager.
* Background in marketing or SMM.
* Experience working with international projects.
* Understanding of social media analytics.

## Tools You Will Use

* Instagram
* Meta Ads Manager
* Canva
* CapCut
* ChatGPT
* Notion
* Google Sheets

## We Offer

* Fully remote work format.
* Schedule: 9:00–18:00 (1-hour break).
* Stable salary, paid twice a month + bonuses.
* Work with international projects and gain real marketing experience.
* A supportive team and opportunities for professional growth — up to SMM Lead or Creative Manager.
